title: W3C HTML Media Extensions Working Group-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C HTML Media Extensions Working Group

items.content_html:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaSource

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Browser compatibility

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

Thank you for your great documentation Mozilla! Almost as great a contribution to the world as Wikipedia.

I have discovered that MediaSource is now available on an iPhone behind an experimental flag. (Now being iOS 16.5.) This makes a big difference to us so I thought to let you know.

What did you expect to see?

This is late-breaking information. I do not know what release this became available on iPhone.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

I can send you a screen shot??

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

items.title: [media-source] iPhone now supports MediaSource behind experimental flag
